cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 2nd Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 2nd Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Escape to a charming retreat perfect for couples or solo travelers! Unwind in a luxurious King bed, with an additional Single bed for added comfort, and enjoy your own ensuite bathroom with a shower and toilet.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Perfect for families and friends, our charming studio offers a cozy King bed, two Single beds, and a private ensuite bathroom for your comfort.enjoy the convenience of a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, electric hob, fridge, and coffee plunger.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ideal for Families spacious Villas  with Super King bed and 2 single beds. Lounge - double divan. Sleeps max 6. Architecturally designed villas, open plan living/dining area.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.labelDescription: Perfect for Mini Groups or families these unique cottage style units have a Queen bed in first bedroom and 2 x Bunk beds in second bedroom, bedding & linen provided
